Package data

Class writeDataToXML

java.lang.Object
data.writeDataToXML
public class writeDataToXML
extends java.lang.Object
This class is used to write data in XML files. It performs actions such as writing newly creating users or conversations, and adding sent messages to conversationXML.
Author:
jules

  • Method Details

    • createXMLFile

      public static void createXMLFile​(org.w3c.dom.Document document, java.lang.String filePath)

    • newMessage

      public static void newMessage​(Message m, int idConv)
      Parameters:
      m - Message we want to write in XML file.
      idConv - Adds a message to convXML after it's been sent.

    • newUser

      public static void newUser​(Utilisateur u, java.lang.String login, java.lang.String passWord)
      Parameters:
      u - User object we want to add to XML.
      login - login for the new user.
      passWord - password for the new user. Adds a newly created user to userXML.

    • addUserToConversationUserXML

      public static void addUserToConversationUserXML​(java.util.UUID userId, java.util.UUID convId)
      Parameters:
      userId - ID of the user.
      convId - ID of the conversation we want to add to the user's convList. In userXML file, adds a specific conversation to the conversation list of a user.

    • addUserToConversationConvXML

      public static void addUserToConversationConvXML​(java.util.UUID userId, java.util.UUID convId)
      Parameters:
      userId - ID of the user to be added in conversation participants.
      convId - ID of correspondant conversation. For a specific conversation, adds a user to it's list of participants in convXML file.

    • addUserToConversation

      public static void addUserToConversation​(java.util.UUID userId, java.util.UUID convId)
      Parameters:
      userId - UUID of the user added to the conversation.
      convId - UUID of the conversation. Performs necessary actions when a user is added to a conversation.

    • newConv

      public static void newConv​(Conversation c)
      Parameters:
      c - conversation object that will be added to XML. Adds the conversation in parameter to conversationXML.
